Package edu.ntnu.idi.bidata.recipe

Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idi.bidata.recipe.Recipe
public class Recipe extends Object
This class represents a recipe. It includes details such as the name, description, cooking instructions, ingredients and amount of servings.
Since:
13.11.24
Version:
1.0.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(String recipeName, String recipeDescription, String cookingInstructions, Map<String,AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<BigDecimal,String>> ingredients, int amountOfServings)
      Constructor that will create a recipe.
      Parameters:
      recipeName - The name of the dish.
      recipeDescription - A description of the dish.
      cookingInstructions - The instructions on how to cook the dish.
      ingredients - A map of the ingredients needed and the amount of ingredient.
      amountOfServings - The number of servings the recipe is intended for.
      Since:
      0.0.1
